Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Leptoglycin (UCLL1; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; Gly-rich, Leu-rich)
Sequence Information.Source: Smoky jungle frog,Leptodactylus pentadactylus, South America

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: rich in G (59%), L (36%).Activity: The peptide inhibited the growth of Gram-negative bacteria P. aeruginosa (MIC 8 uM), E. coli (MIC 50 uM) and C. freundii (MIC 75 uM). Formatted 8/2024
Literature Information.Author: Sousa1 JC, Berto1 RF, Gois EA, Fontenele-Cardi NC, Honório-Júnior JE, Konno K, Richardson M, Rocha MF, Camargo AA, Pimenta DC, Cardi BA, Carvalho KM.2009
Literature Information.Title: Leptoglycin: a new Glycine/Leucine-rich antimicrobial peptide isolated from the skin secretion of the South American frog Leptodactylus pentadactylus (Leptodactylidae).
